response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, but I understand its worth to you is $8,000. Considering its unique features and benefits, I am willing to offer it to you for $12,000. This price reflects my desire to ensure a fair transaction while maximizing the return on my investment. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations or if you require further information. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
